operations.name: createBlock
operations.body:
mutation createBlock($partId: String!) {
  createBlock(partId: $partId) {
    id
    partID
    speed
    speaker
    texts
    duration
    pitch
    volume
    authorID
    __typename
  }
}

operations.name: createPart
createWork
getBlocks
getParts
getWorkName
getWorks
updateBlock
operations.body:
mutation updateBlock($blockId: ID!, $speed: Float, $speaker: String, $texts: String, $duration: Int, $pitch: Int, $volume: Float) {
  updateBlock(
    blockId: $blockId
    speed: $speed
    speaker: $speaker
    texts: $texts
    duration: $duration
    pitch: $pitch
    volume: $volume
  ) {
    id
    partID
    speed
    speaker
    texts
    duration
    pitch
    volume
    authorID
    __typename
  }
}

operations.name: updatePart
updateWork
